text: The Sega Nomad is a portable video game console released by the Sega Corporation. It has a colour screen and can play most games designed for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis, as it shares similarities with the hardware of the Sega Genesis (Mega Drive) It cannot be used with the Sega CD and Sega 32X unless special modifications are made. But such special modifications may not be safe. Fewer than one million Genesis Nomads were sold. Category:Handheld game consoles Category:Sega video game consoles
title: Sega Nomad
